Package control

Class KoRController

java.lang.Object
boardifier.control.Controller
control.KoRController
public class KoRController extends Controller
This class controls the game flow, allowing the AI or player to do specific action with ActionList. It extends the Controller class and manages the main game loop and player turns.

    • KoRController

      public KoRController(Model model, View view, ConsoleController consoleController, GameConfigurationModel gameConfigurationModel)
      Constructs a KoRController with the specified model, view, consoleController, and the gameConfigurationModel.
      Parameters:
      model - the game model.
      view - the game view.
      consoleController - the console controller for handling console input.
      gameConfigurationModel - the configuration model for the game.

  • Method Details

    • stageLoop

      public void stageLoop()
      Defines what to do within the single stage of the single party. Continuously plays the game until it is ended or the game is stuck.
      Specified by:
      stageLoop in class Controller

    • endOfTurn

      public void endOfTurn()
      Ends the current player's turn and sets the next player. Updates the display to show the new player's name.

      Played by :

      - playTurn(KoRStageModel, PlayerData), if next player can play

      - ActionPlayer.start(), if the ActionList ActionList.mustDoEndOfTurn() return true

      Overrides:
      endOfTurn in class Controller
